mapper.select:
SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, apply_no, ass_card_no, price,
add_depre, add_manage_depre, cur_money, fore_money, new_price, note FROM ASS_REMOULD_A_DETAIL WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and apply_no = #{apply_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
